sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react'
import { CheckLabel, Label, TipWrapper2, Title } from '../../Layouts/styledLayouts'
import { withAuthSync } from '../../../utils/auth'
import { Text } from '../../StyledComponents/Text'
import { Divider } from '../../StyledComponents/Divider'
import styled from 'styled-components'
import { device } from '../../../lib/mediaDevice'
import { Wrapper } from '../../StyledComponents/Wrapper'

export default () => {
  const [step, setStep] = useState(1)

  return (
    <Box>
      <Title mb={25}>Your memo for offers</Title>
      <Label fz={18} mb={20}>
        Basic requirements you have to meet to create an offer:
      </Label>
      <CheckLabel label="Nice profile photo (of you)" />
      <CheckLabel label="Confirmed email" />
      <CheckLabel label="Confirmed phone number" />
      <CheckLabel label="Provided payment information" />
      <Divider grey full mt={10} mb={20}></Divider>

      <Label fz={18} mb={20}>
        At the same time, before booking and paying for an offer, Clients have to:
      </Label>
      <CheckLabel label="Agree to Programmer Conditions" />
      <CheckLabel label="Send you a message about their event" />
      <CheckLabel label="Tell you how many people are coming" />
      <CheckLabel label="Confirm their event time" />

      <TipWrapper2 mt={90} mb={15}>
        <Text fz={12} grey4a>
          You need to feel confident with every offer. That’s why we require certain information
          from every Client or Programmer before they can book.
        </Text>
      </TipWrapper2>
    </Box>
  )
}

const Box = styled.div`
  @media ${device.laptopDesktop} {
    ${TipWrapper2} {
      margin-top: 50px;
    }
    ${Text} {
      font-size: 14px;
    }
  }
`
